document.full_text: chicago's derrick rose was in mvp mode on friday scoring a career-high 44 points to lead the bulls to a 99-82 win over the atlanta hawks as dallas beat the los angeles lakers to leave the two-time defending champions on the ropes.
document.title: rose leads bulls to rout of hawks, mavs grab 3-0
lines_and_colors: chicago's derrick rose was in mvp mode on friday scoring a career-high 44 points to lead the bulls to a 99-82 win over the atlanta hawks as dallas beat the los angeles lakers to leave the two-time defending champions on the ropes.
